languages.text: На первый взгляд провиант безнадежно испорчен паршой и отвратительными червями, но стоит отвести взгляд, как омерзительная скверна на полмгновения распалась. "Очередной обман варпа", — решил{mf||а} Лорд-капитан, и выход в реальное пространство доказал его правоту.

traits.locale_text: На первый взгляд провиант безнадежно испорчен паршей и отвратительными червями, но стоит отвести взгляд, как омерзительная скверна на полмгновения распалась. "Очередной обман варпа", — решил Лорд-капитан, и выход в реальное пространство доказал его правоту.

languages.text: At first glance the provisions are hopelessly ruined by scabs and disgusting larvae, but looking away makes the squirming filth vanish into thin air. "Yet another deception of the warp," thought the Lord Captain, proved right when the vessel arrived in realspace.
languages.original_text: На первый взгляд провиант безнадежно испорчен паршой и отвратительными червями, но стоит отвести взгляд, как омерзительная скверна на полмгновения распалась. "Очередной обман варпа", — решил{mf||а} Лорд-капитан, и выход в реальное пространство доказал его правоту.

traits.locale_text: At first glance the provisions are hopelessly ruined by scabs and disgusting larvae, but looking away makes the squirming filth vanish into thin air. "Yet another deception", — thought the Lord Captain, and was proven right when the vessel arrived in the realspace.

At first glance the provisions are hopelessly ruined by scabs and disgusting larvae, but looking away makes the squirming filth vanish into thin air. "Yet another deception", — thought the Lord Captain, and was proven right when the vessel arrived in the realspace.

At first glance the provisions are hopelessly ruined by scabs and disgusting larvae, but looking away makes the squirming filth vanish into thin air. "Yet another deception of the warp", — thought the Lord Captain, proved right when the vessel arrived in realspace.

At first glance the provisions are hopelessly ruined by scabs and disgusting larvae, but looking away makes the squirming filth vanish into thin air. "Yet another deception of the warp," thought the Lord Captain, proved right when the vessel arrived in realspace.

At first glance the provisions are hopelessly ruined by scabs and disgusting larvae, but looking away makes the squirming filth vanish into thin air. "Yet another deception of the warp," thought the Lord Captain, proved right when the vessel arrived in realspace.

languages.text: 乍看之下，这些粮食都已腐烂得无可救药，上面满是霉块与蛆虫，但一旦将目光移开，这些蠕动的污秽却凭空消失得无影无踪。“不过又是亚空间的骗局罢了，”领主舰长如此想道。当舰船抵达真实世界之后，事实正如舰长所想。
languages.original_text: At first glance the provisions are hopelessly ruined by scabs and disgusting larvae, but looking away makes the squirming filth vanish into thin air. "Yet another deception of the warp," thought the Lord Captain, proved right when the vessel arrived in realspace.

traits.locale_text: 乍看之下，这些粮食都已腐烂得无可救药，上面满是霉块与蛆虫，但一旦将目光移开，这些蠕动的污秽却凭空消失得无影无踪。“不过又是亚空间的骗局罢了，”领主舰长如此想道。当舰船抵达真实世界之后，事实正如舰长所想。

languages.text: A primera vista, las provisiones están completamente arruinadas por las costras y las asquerosas larvas, pero al apartar la vista, la suciedad se esfuma en el aire. «Otro engaño más de la disformidad», pensó {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, lo cual se demostró cuando la nave llegó al espacio real.
languages.original_text: At first glance the provisions are hopelessly ruined by scabs and disgusting larvae, but looking away makes the squirming filth vanish into thin air. "Yet another deception of the warp," thought the Lord Captain, proved right when the vessel arrived in realspace.

traits.locale_text: A primera vista, las provisiones están completamente arruinadas por las costras y las asquerosas larvas, pero al apartar la vista, la suciedad se esfuma en el aire. «Otro engaño más de la disformidad», pensó {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, lo cual se demostró cuando la nave llegó al espacio real.

languages.text: 一見したところ、食料はカビや気持ちの悪い虫ケラにすっかりメチャクチャにされているものの、横を見るとうごめく汚物が跡形もなく消えていく。「またもや<歪み>の策略か」と、ロード・キャプテンは頭の中で呟き、船がリアルスペースに到着した時にそれが正しいと証明した。
languages.original_text: At first glance the provisions are hopelessly ruined by scabs and disgusting larvae, but looking away makes the squirming filth vanish into thin air. "Yet another deception of the warp," thought the Lord Captain, proved right when the vessel arrived in realspace.

traits.locale_text: 一見したところ、食料はカビや気持ちの悪い虫ケラにすっかりメチャクチャにされているものの、横を見るとうごめく汚物が跡形もなく消えていく。「またもや<歪み>の策略か」と、ロード・キャプテンは頭の中で呟き、船がリアルスペースに到着した時にそれが正しいと証明した。

languages.text: De prime abord, les provisions semblent irrémédiablement corrompues par la putrescence et les larves fétides, mais l'immondice disparaît dès que vous détournez le regard. "Ce n'est rien de plus qu'une nouvelle sournoiserie créée par le Warp", se dit {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, une conclusion qui se confirme dès le retour dans l'espace réel.
languages.original_text: At first glance the provisions are hopelessly ruined by scabs and disgusting larvae, but looking away makes the squirming filth vanish into thin air. "Yet another deception of the warp," thought the Lord Captain, proved right when the vessel arrived in realspace.

traits.locale_text: De prime abord, les provisions semblent irrémédiablement corrompues par la putrescence et les larves fétides, mais l'immondice disparaît dès que vous détournez le regard. "Ce n'est rien de plus qu'une nouvelle sournoiserie créée par le Warp", se dit {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, une conclusion qui se confirme dès le retour dans l'espace réel.

languages.text: Auf den ersten Blick wirkt es, als seien die Vorräte hoffnungslos durch Milben und widerwärtige Larven ruiniert, doch wenn man wegsieht, löst sich das widerliche Gewusel in Luft auf. "Bestimmt wieder nur eine Täuschung das Warps", dachte der Lord Captain, und als das Raumschiff im Realraum ankam, wurde diese Annahme bestätigt.
languages.original_text: At first glance the provisions are hopelessly ruined by scabs and disgusting larvae, but looking away makes the squirming filth vanish into thin air. "Yet another deception of the warp," thought the Lord Captain, proved right when the vessel arrived in realspace.

traits.locale_text: Auf den ersten Blick wirkt es, als seien die Vorräte hoffnungslos durch Milben und widerwärtige Larven ruiniert, doch wenn man wegsieht, löst sich das widerliche Gewusel in Luft auf. "Bestimmt wieder nur eine Täuschung das Warps", dachte der Lord Captain, und als das Raumschiff im Realraum ankam, wurde diese Annahme bestätigt.

languages.text: İlk bakışta erzaklar, kabuklar ve iğrenç larvalarla mahvolmuş gibi dursa da başka tarafa bakıldığında hepsinin kaybolup gittiği görüldü. Lord Kaptan, "Bir öteboyut aldatmacası daha." diye düşündü. Gemi gerçekuzaya ulaştığında bu düşüncesinde haklı olduğu ortaya çıktı.
languages.original_text: At first glance the provisions are hopelessly ruined by scabs and disgusting larvae, but looking away makes the squirming filth vanish into thin air. "Yet another deception of the warp," thought the Lord Captain, proved right when the vessel arrived in realspace.
